nodes.text: Suborbital jumpers were a kind of vehicle, intended for transport between different areas of a planet. Among their users was the New Republic Security Bureau by 18 ABY. Three of them were deployed to Yavin 4 colony under the command of Sela Trune while hunting down the Spice Runners of Kijimi, although they were outmaneuvered by Poe Dameron.
The jumpers first appeared in canon in the novel 2017 novel Leia, Princess of Alderaan by Claudia Gray,, although they originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity.
